level.heading: Board of Examiners in Veterinary Medicine - created; appointment; composition; qualifications; term of office; vacancies; removal; officers; meetings; records; bond; annual report; application for license; collection and disposition of fees; examinations; issuance of licenses; reciprocity; exemptions from examination or fee; appeal from refusal of license; Board of Review; display of license; inspection of place of business; persons regarded as practitioners; exemptions from chapter; revocation or suspension of license; penalties; prosecutions.
